Breakfast.details: Overnight Oats: 1/2 cup oats, 1 cup almond milk, 1 tbsp chia seeds, 1/2 cup blueberries, 1 tbsp almond butter
Breakfast.instructions: Mix oats, almond milk, chia seeds, and blueberries in a jar. Refrigerate overnight. Add almond butter before serving.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Apple Slices with Peanut Butter: 1 apple sliced, 2 tbsp peanut butter
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Slice the apple and serve with peanut butter.

Lunch.details: Quinoa Salad: 1 cup cooked quinoa, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, 1/2 cup cucumber, 1/4 cup feta cheese, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice
Lunch.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and serve.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts: 1 cup Greek yogurt, 1 tbsp honey, 1/4 cup mixed nuts
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Top Greek yogurt with honey and mixed nuts.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Protein Smoothie: 1 banana, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, 1 cup almond milk, 1 tbsp peanut butter

Dinner.details: Grilled Chicken with Vegetables: 6 oz grilled chicken breast, 1 cup steamed broccoli, 1/2 cup quinoa
Dinner.instructions: Grill the chicken breast and steam the broccoli. Serve with cooked quinoa.

Evening Snack.details: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple: 1 cup cottage cheese, 1/2 cup pineapple chunks
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with pineapple chunks.
